projects.title: Paraiso
projects.description: Designed and implemented a three-tier platform with customer, restaurant, and admin functionalities. Integrated features include reservations, pick-up orders, a reward system, and sharing it with friends.

projects.title: Little Lemon
projects.description: A React Native mobile app for the Little Lemon restaurant. Displays menu items, supports search, filtering, and SQLite database storage.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: My personal portfolio website built with React.js to showcase my skills, projects, and experience.
